name: A Few Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest
name_original: A Few Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest
description:
A Few Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest is a strategy game developed by Daniel Lyon. It came out on 30-09-2021.
A Few Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
